problem_definition.command_line: make clean-run-debug; make clean-checkpoint; fluidity -v2 -l square-convection.flml; cd checkpoint; make; fluidity -v2 -l square-convection_50_checkpoint.flml; cd ..

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import fluidity.diagnostics.utils as utils import fluidity.diagnostics.vtutools as vtktools
vtu = vtktools.vtu("square-convection_51.vtu") line = vtktools.PlanarVtuCut(vtu, origin = (0.5, 0.0, 0.0), normal = (1.0, 0.0, 0.0))
coords = line.GetLocations() vel = line.GetVectorField("Velocity")
z = [coord[1] for coord in coords] u = [val[0] for val in vel] z, u = utils.KeyedSort(z, u, returnSortedKeys = True)
final_mid_line_u = [(z[i], u[i]) for i in range(len(z))]

import fluidity.diagnostics.utils as utils import fluidity.diagnostics.vtutools as vtktools
vtu = vtktools.vtu("square-convection_51.vtu") line = vtktools.PlanarVtuCut(vtu, origin = (0.0, 0.5, 0.0), normal = (0.0, 1.0, 0.0))
coords = line.GetLocations() vel = line.GetVectorField("Velocity")
x = [coord[0] for coord in coords] w = [val[1] for val in vel] x, w = utils.KeyedSort(x, w, returnSortedKeys = True)
final_mid_line_w = [(x[i], w[i]) for i in range(len(x))]

import fluidity_tools s = fluidity_tools.stat_parser("square-convection.detectors") left_boundary_mid_height_nus = s["Fluid"]["TemperatureGradient"]["LeftBoundaryMidHeight"][0] left_boundary_mid_height_nus = [-val for val in left_boundary_mid_height_nus]

import vtktools vtu = vtktools.vtu("square-convection_51.vtu") coords = vtu.GetLocations() gradT = vtu.GetVectorField("TemperatureGradient") final_left_boundary_nus = [] for i, coord in enumerate(coords): if coord[0] < 1.0e-6: final_left_boundary_nus.append((coord[1], -gradT[i][0]))
import fluidity_tools s = fluidity_tools.stat_parser("checkpoint/square-convection-picked-up.stat") picked_up_start_time = s["ElapsedTime"]["value"][0] - s["dt"]["value"][0]
import os files = os.listdir("./checkpoint") picked_up_solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import vtktools vtu1 = vtktools.vtu("square-convection_50.vtu") vtu2 = vtktools.vtu("checkpoint/square-convection-picked-up_CoordinateMesh_0_checkpoint.vtu") pickup_initial_vtudiff = vtktools.VtuDiff(vtu1, vtu2)
import vtktools vtu1 = vtktools.vtu("square-convection_51.vtu") vtu2 = vtktools.vtu("checkpoint/square-convection-picked-up_1.vtu") pickup_final_vtudiff = vtktools.VtuDiff(vtu1, vtu2)

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools max = final_mid_line_u[0] for z, u in final_mid_line_u[1:]: if u > max[1]: max = (z, u) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(max[0], 0.813, 0.01) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(max[1], 3.649, 0.002)

import fluidity_tools max = final_mid_line_w[0] for x, w in final_mid_line_w[1:]: if w > max[1]: max = (x, w) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(max[0], 0.178, 0.08) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(max[1], 3.697, 0.002)

test.name: Final left boundary Nu extrema benchmarks

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools min = final_left_boundary_nus[0] max = final_left_boundary_nus[0] for z, nu in final_left_boundary_nus[1:]: if nu < min[1]: min = (z, nu) if nu > max[1]: max = (z, nu) print("Min Nu = " + str(min[1]) + " at z = " + str(min[0])) print("Max Nu = " + str(max[1]) + " at z = " + str(max[0])) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(min[0], 1.0, 0.1) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(min[1], 0.692, 0.03) assert(abs(max[0] - 0.092) < 0.1) fluidity_tools.compare_variable(max[1], 1.505, 0.01)

test.name: Picked up simulation started from correct time

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools assert(len(pickup_initial_vtudiff.GetFieldNames()) > 0) for fieldName in pickup_initial_vtudiff.GetFieldNames(): print("Testing: " + fieldName) field = pickup_initial_vtudiff.GetField(fieldName) maxAbsVal = max(abs(field.max()), abs(field.min())) print("Max abs val = " + str(maxAbsVal)) assert(maxAbsVal < 1.0e-6)

test.name: Picked up fields correct after additional timestep

pass_tests.test: import fluidity_tools assert(len(pickup_final_vtudiff.GetFieldNames()) > 0) for fieldName in pickup_final_vtudiff.GetFieldNames(): print("Testing: " + fieldName) field = pickup_final_vtudiff.GetField(fieldName) maxAbsVal = max(abs(field.max()), abs(field.min())) print("Max abs val = " + str(maxAbsVal)) assert(maxAbsVal < 1.0e-6)
